alert.note: Alert for Logan; Macon; Mason; Moultrie; Tazewell; Woodford (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 05 at 1:44AM CDT until November 05 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM CDT THIS MORNING... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 4 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, south winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 25 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Woodford, Tazewell, Mason, Logan, Macon and Moultrie Counties. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 11 AM CDT this morning. For the Wind Advisory, from 11 AM this morning to 4 PM CDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will cause damage to trees and power lines, with sporadic power outages likely. Additionally, travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles along East- West oriented roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...showers and thunderstorms will accompany the windy conditions, and may locally enhance winds.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Logan; Macon; Mason; Moultrie; Tazewell; Woodford
